actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to expand the scope of services provided to veterans in Vet Centers.

summary.text: Adds to the medical care authorized to be provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to veterans in vet centers: (1) counseling to combat veterans of World War II or the Korean conflict; (2) preventive health care services; (3) medical services reasonably necessary in preparation for hospital admission; and (4) referral services to assist veterans in obtaining specialized care. Requires a report from the Secretary on the implementation of such additional care.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to expand the scope of services provided to veterans in Vet Centers.
